original_text: Hear, Israel: You are now about to cross the Jordan to go in and dispossess nations greater and stronger than you, with large cities that have walls up to the sky.
korean_text: 이스라엘아 들으라 네가 오늘 요단을 건너 너보다 강대한 나라들로 들어가서 그것을 차지하리니 그 성읍들은 크고 성벽은 하늘에 닿았으며

sentences.original_text: You are now about to cross the Jordan
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 이제 요단을 건너려 하고 있다

sentences.original_text: to go in and dispossess nations
that have walls up to the sky.
